message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth more than that to you. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate it, but $14,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I understand your position. I'm willing to come down to $13,500, which is still a good deal for both of us. Let's make this happen!
